original_text: That ye might walk worthy of the Lord unto all pleasing, being fruitful in every good work, and increasing in the knowledge of God;
korean_text: 주께 합당하게 행하여 범사에 기쁘시게 하고 모든 선한 일에 열매를 맺게 하시며 하나님을 아는 것에 자라게 하시고

sentences.original_text: That ye might walk worthy of the Lord
being fruitful in every good work
and increasing in the knowledge of God
